title: Isaac Jacobs White Wood Sentiments Mom Picture Frame, 4x6 inch, Photo Gift for Mother, Family, Display on Tabletop, Desk (White)
features: FRAME A SPECIAL MOMENT: This keepsake frame is a lovely way to showcase your photos and title them with affection. Beautiful, clean and sweet, the wooden cutout letters give the frame an emotional punch as it emphasizes your precious pictures. They say a picture is worth a thousand words, and with this sentiment on the frame, it goes above and beyond the standard at a thousand and one :)

FRAME DESIGN: Simple but versatile, the frame’s clean white wooden border with 1.5-inch thickness captures the heart of your photos. On the bottom are playful wood cutout letters painted in a natural wood stain that spell “mom”. The cute modern lettering, contrasting the frame color is sure to give character and emphasis to any family snapshot. Celebrate the importance of Mom on her birthday, Mother’s Day, holidays, anniversary, new baby, or “just because” with this sentimental frame

SURROUND YOURSELF WITH MEMORIES: Turn memories into beautiful framed art that spruces up your home décor. You’ll create a warm and inviting atmosphere by adding framed photos of your celebratory moments and cherished love ones to your home or office. The sturdy frame complements the room design and fills the space with expression and special personal touch

FITS STANDARD PHOTO SIZE: Fits a 4 by 6 photo in vertical orientation (portrait). Frame has easel back for easy display onto any table, desk, counter, or shelf. Hanging tab is also included for wall mounting

GIVE THE PERFECT GIFT: Picking out something for others can be tricky, but they’ll appreciate this universal frame that keeps memories alive and timeless. Browse our wood sentiment frame collection for frames that go for anyone and/or for any occasion. You’ve got the picture covered, and we’ve got the sentiment
description: Your memories deserve to be kept in a special display. Set this frame up in your living room, den, bedroom, entryway and around home or office with this beautiful picture frame. Sentiments can hold memories forever. This frame will provide a stunning accent to your decor, hanging on your wall or as a tabletop display. With its simple yet elegant design it can be combined with other frames for a unique look. This item comes individually packaged which makes it a perfect gift for the women in your life: a wife, partner, daughter, grandma, sister, aunt and close friends and family
